titleStmt.title: A designe for bringing a navigable river from Rickmansworth in Hartfordshire to St. Gyles in the fields the benefits of it declared and the objections against it.
titleStmt.author: Ford, Edward, Sir, 1605-1670.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Ford.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
